sqlMap.update:
update DRP_ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE
ADVC_ORDER_ID = #ADVC_ORDER_ID# ADVC_ORDER_NO = #ADVC_ORDER_NO# TERM_ID = #TERM_ID# TERM_NO = #TERM_NO# TERM_NAME = #TERM_NAME# SALE_DATE = to_date(#SALE_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD') SALE_PSON_ID = #SALE_PSON_ID# SALE_PSON_NAME = #SALE_PSON_NAME# CUST_NAME = #CUST_NAME# TEL = #TEL# RECV_ADDR = #RECV_ADDR# ADVC_AMOUNT = #ADVC_AMOUNT# PAYABLE_AMOUNT = #PAYABLE_AMOUNT# STATE = #STATE# REMARK = #REMARK# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_TIME = sysdate DEPT_ID = #DEPT_ID# DEPT_NAME = #DEPT_NAME# ORG_ID = #ORG_ID# ORG_NAME = #ORG_NAME# LEDGER_ID = #LEDGER_ID# LEDGER_NAME = #LEDGER_NAME# DIFF_AMOUNT = #DIFF_AMOUNT# OLD_CUST_NAME = #OLD_CUST_NAME# OLD_TEL = #OLD_TEL# OLD_RECV_ADDR = #OLD_RECV_ADDR#
where ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_ID = #ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_ID#

update DRP_ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE c set c.DIFF_AMOUNT= (select NVL(SUM(NVL(a.PAYABLE_AMOUNT,0)-NVL(b.PAYABLE_AMOUNT,0)),0) from DRP_ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_DTL a left join DRP_ADVC_ORDER_DTL b on a.ADVC_ORDER_DTL_ID=b.ADVC_ORDER_DTL_ID where a.ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_ID=#ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_ID# and a.DEL_FLAG=0) where c.ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_ID=#ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_ID#

update DRP_ADVC_ORDER a set TOTAL_AMOUNT=( select sum(PAYABLE_AMOUNT) from DRP_ADVC_ORDER_DTL b where ADVC_ORDER_ID=#ADVC_ORDER_ID# and DEL_FLAG=0 ), PAYABLE_AMOUNT=( (select sum(PAYABLE_AMOUNT) from DRP_ADVC_ORDER_DTL where ADVC_ORDER_ID=#ADVC_ORDER_ID# and DEL_FLAG=0)- (select NVL(DISCOUNT_AMOUNT,0) from DRP_ADVC_ORDER where ADVC_ORDER_ID=#ADVC_ORDER_ID#) )
where ADVC_ORDER_ID=#ADVC_ORDER_ID#
update DRP_ADVC_ORDER set ORDER_RECV_DATE=(select min(ORDER_RECV_DATE) from DRP_ADVC_ORDER_DTL where ADVC_ORDER_ID=#ADVC_ORDER_ID# and DEL_FLAG=0) where ADVC_ORDER_ID=#ADVC_ORDER_ID#

update DRP_ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_DTL
PRD_ID = #PRD_ID# PRD_NO = #PRD_NO# PRD_NAME = #PRD_NAME# PRD_SPEC = #PRD_SPEC# PRD_COLOR = #PRD_COLOR# BRAND = #BRAND# STD_UNIT = #STD_UNIT# PRICE = #PRICE# DECT_RATE = #DECT_RATE# DECT_PRICE = #DECT_PRICE# ORDER_NUM = #ORDER_NUM# PAYABLE_AMOUNT = #PAYABLE_AMOUNT# REMARK = #REMARK# SPCL_TECH_ID = #SPCL_TECH_ID# ORDER_RECV_DATE = to_date(#ORDER_RECV_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD') FREEZE_NUM = #FREEZE_NUM# UNFREEZE_NUM = #UNFREEZE_NUM#
where ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_DTL_ID = #ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_DTL_ID#

update ${SYSSCHEMA}.DRP_ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE
STATE = #STATE# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPD_TIME =sysdate
where ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_ID=#ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update DRP_ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# ,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME# ,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR# ,UPD_TIME=sysdate where ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_ID = #ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_ID#
update DRP_ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_ID = #ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_ID:VARCHAR#
update DRP_ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_DTL_ID in ($ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_DTL_IDS$)

update DRP_ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_HIS set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where ADVC_ORDER_DTL_ID in (select ADVC_ORDER_DTL_ID from DRP_ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_DTL where ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_DTL_ID in ($ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_DTL_IDS$)) and ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_ID=#ADVC_ORDER_CHANGE_ID#
